idea-plugin.name: GMavenPlus IntelliJ Plugin
idea-plugin.description: Activates Groovy plugin in Intellij IDEA when the GMavenPlus plugin is present in the pom. This adds the Groovy directories (src/main/groovy and src/test/groovy) to the IDEA build. Inspired from Eclipse Groovy Compiler Plugin at https://github.com/rvowles/eclipsemavengroovy-idea.
